134407.「この宮殿の中でのみ 使うことができる\n 封印の聖灰を取り扱っています。\n:
My task is to handle the Sealing Ash, which
can only be used inside this palace.
What is it I can do for you?
<break>

134421.「封印の聖灰を <%nL_POINT_NUM>個使って\n <%nL_SEAL_:
<%dL_POINT_NUM> Sealing Ash will be used to
seal <%dL_SEAL_NUM> effect(s).
Is this all right?
<yesno 1><break>

134422.「封印の聖灰を使って\n 戦神のベルトにつく効果を封印します。\n 封印する効果:
Sealing Ash is used to seal the effects on
your War Deity Belts. Select the effects
that you wish to seal.
<break>

134423.「すでに 戦神のベルトにつく効果を\n 最大まで 封印しています。\n<brea:
You've already sealed the maximum amount
of effects possible.
<break>

134424.「この効果は すでに封印されています。\n<bw_break>:
This effect has already been sealed.
<bw_break>

134425.「これ以上 戦神のベルトにつく効果を\n 封印することは できません。\n<bw:
No further effects on the War Deity Belt can
be sealed.
<bw_break>

134426.「封印の聖灰が <%nL_LACK_NUM>個 足りません。\n<bw_brea:
You will require <%dL_LACK_NUM> more Sealing Ash
to seal that.
<bw_break>

134427.選んだ戦神効果を <%nL_SEAL_NUM>種類 封印した！\n<se_not:
The <%dL_SEAL_NUM> effect type(s) you have
chosen have been sealed!
<se_nots System 7>
<bw_break>

134431.「戦神のベルトの効果を 封印していません。\n<bw_break>:
The effects of the War Deity Belt have not
been sealed.
<bw_break>

134848.「<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>を 捧げると\n 封印の聖灰が<:
If you offer that <%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>, you
will get <%dL_POINT_NUM> Sealing Ash. The offered item will
be lost. Are you certain?
<yesno 2><break>

134849.「<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>は\n 今 装備しているものです:
<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> is currently
equipped. Are you sure you want to offer it?
<yesno 2><break>

134850.「今持っている封印の聖灰は <%nL_TOTAL_NUM>個です。\n 封印の聖:
You currently have <%dL_TOTAL_NUM> Sealing Ash.
I can give you more, but only if you offer an
item to me. Which one will you offer?
<break>

134851.「封印の聖灰は <%nL_MAX_NUM>個までしか持てません。\n 今 <%s:
You can only hold <%dL_MAX_NUM> Sealing Ash. If you offer
<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> now, it will only
increase by <%dL_GET_NUM>, is that OK?
<yesno 2><break>

134852.<pc>は\n<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>を 捧げて\n封印の:
<pc> received <%dL_GET_NUM> Sealing Ash
from the offered item!
<se_nots System 7>
<bw_break>

134853.「<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>は\n ロックされていますので\:
<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> is locked, so you
cannot offer it.
<bw_break>

134854.「残念ですが 封印の聖灰に変えられる\n アイテムをお持ちではないようです。\n:
Unfortunately, you do not have an Item that
can be converted to Sealing Ash.
<bw_break>

134855.「これ以上 封印の聖灰を\n 増やすことは できません。\n<bw_break>:
You cannot hold any more Sealing Ash.
<bw_break>

What do you wish to inquire about?

Obtaining Sealing Ash

Sealing Effects

The effects of your <%sL_ITEM>

<break>

You failed to strengthen the belt... Please

<bw_break>

That will require <%dL_KYOUKA_ITEMNUM> <%sL_KYOUKA_ITEM>.

given inside this palace.
<bw_break>

You don't have any <%sL_KYOUKA_ITEM> to strengthen your <%sL_ITEM>.
<%sL_KYOUKA_ITEM> can be obtained as a reward from the Dark Deity's Palace.

158887.「<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>は\n これ以上 強化することは:
That <%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> cannot be
strengthened any further.<bw_break>

158889.<pc>は <%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>と\n<%sL_KYO:

158890.おや……？ なんと <%sL_ITEM>が\n強い光を放ちはじめた……！\n<b:
What's this...? Suddenly, the
<%sL_ITEM> begins to shine brightly!

158891.さらに<%sL_KOUKA>が\n<%sL_CHANGE_KOUKA>に\n変わ:
In addition, the <%sL_KOUKA>
effect has changed to
<%sL_CHANGE_KOUKA>!<se_nots System 7>
<bw_break>

158892.<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>に 新たな効果がめざめ\n<%sL:
<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> awakens a new effect: <%sL_ADD_KOUKA>!
<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> is now <%sL_ITEM><%sL_RESLT_PLUSNUM>!

317256.「封印する効果が 何も選ばれていません。\n<bw_break>:
You haven't selected any effects to seal.
<bw_break>

317576.「封印の聖灰は 『封印の聖灰を増やす』を\n 選んで 特定のアクセサリーを捧げる:
Choosing "Obtain Sealing Ash" will allow you
to offer one of your accessories in exchange
for Sealing Ash.
<bw_break>

317577.「戦神のベルトに 効果を付与するアイテムは\n ３種類 あります。\n<br>\:
There are three different types of items that can add effects to a War Deity Belt.
The first is a Demon Stone. It will add a a random effect with a random value.
To add a third and fourth effect requires 1 Demon Stone. Adding a fifth effect requires 5 of them.
Next is a Super Demon Stone. This stone allows to replace an effect on a War Deity Belt +5 with an effect of your choice.
However, this value will be randomized. Each effect has the same chance of becoming the highest value.
Lastly is the Uber Demon Stone. This stone allows you to replace an effect on a War Deity Belt +5 with an effect of your choice,
and this effect will be at the maximum possible value. These stones can be purchased in the DQX Shop.
You can visit the DQX Shop using the following link: https://sqex.to/dqxshop

317578.「封印の聖灰を使うと 戦神のベルトにつく\n さまざまな効果のうち 最大６０個ま:
Sealing Ash can be used to seal up to 60 of the various effects that may appear on War Deity Belts you find.
When an effect is sealed, it will no longer appear on any future War Deity Belts you obtain.

317579.「封印した効果を 解除すると\n 戦神のベルトを 手に入れた時に\n その効果が:
By removing a sealed effect, the effect may once again appear on any future War Deity Belts you obtain.
To remove a seal, you will need 5 Sealing Ash per seal removed.
However, if you wish to remove 10 or more seals at once, I will require 50 Sealing Ash.
When removing a seal, any Sealing Ash you spent to seal it will be returned to you.

317920.「覚醒の鬼石か 覚醒の鬼神石を持っていないと\n 強化できません。\n<br>\:
The Super Demon Stone can be obtained from the treasure chest that is the first reward in Dark Deity's Palace, Heaven's Hell. Uber Demon
Stone can be purchased at the DQX Shop. players-only website Awakening Adventurer's SquareDragon Quest X Shop (DQX Shop)https://sqex.to/dqxshop

317921.「<%sL_KYOUKA_ITEM>を 持っていません。\n <%sL_KYOU:
You do not have <%sL_KYOUKA_ITEM>. You can get <%sL_KYOUKA_ITEM> from the treasure chest of the first reward in Dark Deity's Palace,
Heavenly Hell.
